text: Mistletoe is a comedy album by The Bob & Tom Show, which was first released in December 2003. It is a single disc CD which represents original material recorded during their syndicated, daily radio show and other studio numbers which had not been previously presented on air. ==Track listings== Category:2003 Christmas albums Category:Christmas albums by American artists Category:The Bob & Tom Show albums Category:2000s comedy albums
title: Mistletoe (album)
